level.heading: CANCELLATION OF INVITATIONS FOR BIDS BEFORE OPENING (ยง 27-1518)

level.text: The contracting officer shall not cancel an IFB unless the Director determines in writing that cancellation is in the best interest of the District.
If an IFB is canceled before bid opening, the contracting officer shall:
Return to the bidders unopened bids that have been received via mail or hand-delivery; or
Purge all bids that have been received electronically from primary and backup data storage systems.
The contracting officer shall promptly publish on the Internet a notice of cancellation.
